id.description: Transaction id of sale to annul

cancellationUrl.description: Url execute when user click in cancel payment before complete the payment process

PayPhone.Button.Business.Models.PrepareS.description: Model for accept the new sale request

payWithPayPhone.description: Url for redirect and pay with PayPhone

payWithCard.description: Url for redirect to PayPhone and pay only with your credit card

clientTxId.description: Gets or sets the client tx identifier.

amount.description: Tax amount charged the sum of value and tax field

reference.description: Reference describing the transaction MAX(50 characters)

storeId.description: Store identifier. It can be found in the developer's console

oneTime.description: The link only can pay one time, the pay must be approved

expireIn.description: When the link is no longer available in hours

deferred.description: Flag that indicate if the payment was deferred or not

authorizationCode.description: Authorization code emiting by bank, this field have value is transaction status was approved

messageCode.description: Message code for the reason why transaction not approved

currency.description: ISO code A of transaction currency

date.description: Fecha en la que se realizo la transaccin

regionIso.description: ISO code de la region de la tienda que recibi el pago

nickName.description: The user nickname optional if ChargeByNickName is false

chargeByNickName.description: If true the user find by nickname. Note the nickname in this case is required

phoneNumber.description: User phone number optional if ChargeByNickName is true

clientUserId.description: (Optional) Identifier of the user generated in the client application

reference.description: (Optional) Field to send a reference of your purchase

responseUrl.description: Response Url where our server send the payment result
